properties.description: This initiative includes audit and virtual machine extension deployment policies that address a subset of NIST SP 800-53 R4 controls. Additional policies will be added in upcoming releases. For more information, visit https://aka.ms/nist80053-blueprint.

metadata.displayName: Include Arc connected servers for Guest Configuration policies
metadata.description: Optionally choose to audit settings inside Arc connected servers using Guest Configuration policies. By selecting this option, you agree to be charged monthly per Arc connected machine.

metadata.displayName: Log Analytics workspace ID for VM agent reporting
List of resource types that should have resource logs enabled
List of users excluded from Windows VM Administrators group
List of users that must be included in Windows VM Administrators group
